function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Validation studies for wearables have not been conducted, creating obstacles for healthcare workers regarding their clinical utility.","Impact":"Obstacles in using wearables for healthcare due to lack of validation studies, potentially leading to ineffective use of the technology.","Mitigation":"Conduct validation studies to demonstrate the clinical utility of wearables for healthcare applications and provide evidence of their effectiveness.","Technologies":"Data analytics and medical research technologies for conducting validation studies and analyzing the results.","People":"Healthcare workers","Owner":"Medical research institutions and healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"False-positive results from wearables create risks and require greater effort for correct interpretation of the data.","Impact":"Increased risk of misdiagnosis and unnecessary actions due to false-positive results from wearables.","Mitigation":"Develop algorithms and protocols for accurate interpretation of wearable data to minimize false positives and improve diagnostic accuracy.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms and data interpretation software for wearable data analysis.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, technology companies"},{"Description":"Patients are concerned with the privacy and security of their data when using wearables, as breaching of digital network security can lead to data exposure.","Impact":"Potential compromise of patient data privacy and security in the event of a breach in digital network security.","Mitigation":"Implement robust data encryption and security measures in wearables and associated digital networks to protect patient data.","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, secure data transmission protocols, and network security measures.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Technology companies, healthcare organizations"}]}
